entry.title: C#动态创建对象
entry.content:
C#通过全类名创建对象

public static class Program
{
    public static void Main(string[] args)
    {
       var  teacher = GetObj<IPerson>("ConsoleApp.Teacher")!;
        
       teacher.Eat("胡");
       
       var  student = GetObj<IPerson>("ConsoleApp.Student")!;
        
       student.Eat("胡");
    }

    private static TInterface? GetObj<TInterface> (string name)
    {
       var t = (TInterface) Activator.CreateInstance(Type.GetType(name)!)!;
       return t;
    }
}

entry.title: Office Online Server搭建操作
entry.content:
SAF

创建OOS场

New-OfficeWebAppsFarm -InternalURL http://192.168.116.176 -AllowHttp -EditingEnabled

开放URL

Set-OfficeWebAppsFarm -OpenFromUrlEnabled:$true
